title: Moment of Truth

en: Okay, #NAME. It's time to tally up how much you brought home the bacon.
You made #MONEY_MONTH this month. That's... not enough.

I've thought a lot about this over the past month. And I just - I don't think I can be with you while you're taking such big risks. It just doesn't feel safe to me. So, if this is really something you still want to do, I think we should end this.

yes_caption: Skylar... I won't give you up!

en: skylar::"You mean... you'll give up your dream, just to make me feel safe?"
skylar::"I... I'm so happy, but I also feel... so bad..."
